resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205249</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fairness: Incarceration of Japanese Americans During World War II</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerechtigkeit: Einsperrung der japanischen 
Amerikaner während des Zweiten Weltkrieges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Equitabilité : Incarcération des 
Américains japonais pendant la deuxième guerre mondiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fairness: Incarceration de americanos 
japoneses durante a segunda guerra mundial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparzialità: Incarcerazione degli Americani
giapponesi durante la seconda guerra mondiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δικαιοσύνη: Φυλάκιση ιαπωνικών Αμερικανών κατά 
τη διάρκεια του παγκόσμιου πολέμου ΙΙ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imparcialidad: Encarcelamiento de americanos 
japoneses durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The purpose of this lesson is to have students examine the concept of equality, one of the fundamental concepts embodied in our constitution and laws, and try to understand why Japanese Americans were treated so unfairly during WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck dieser Lektion ist, Kursteilnehmer das 
Konzept der Gleichheit, eins der grundlegenden Konzepte, die in 
unserer Beschaffenheit und in Gesetzen dargestellt werden, und Versuch
überprüfen zu lassen, um zu verstehen, warum japanische Amerikaner 
so unfairly während WWII behandelt wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de cette leçon est de faire examiner à 
des étudiants le concept de l'égalité, un des concepts fondamentaux
incorporés dans notre constitution et lois, et l'essai pour 
comprendre pourquoi des Américains japonais ont été traités 
tellement injustement pendant le WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade desta lição é mandar estudantes 
examinar o conceito da igualdade, um dos conceitos fundamentais 
embodied em nossos constitution e leis, e a tentativa para compreender
porque os americanos japoneses foram tratados assim unfairly durante 
WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di questa lezione è fare esaminare agli 
allievi il concetto di uguaglianza, uno dei concetti fondamentali 
compresi nella nostre costituzione e leggi e la prova per capire 
perchè gli Americani giapponesi sono stati curati così unfairly 
durante il WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός αυτού του μαθήματος είναι να υπάρξουν οι 
σπουδαστές να εξετάσουν την έννοια της ισότητας, μια από τις 
θεμελιώδεις έννοιες που ενσωματώνονται στο σύνταγμά μας και τους 
νόμους, και να προσπαθήσουν να καταλάβει γιατί ιαπωνικοί 
Αμερικανοί θεραπεύθηκαν τόσο άδικα κατά τη διάρκεια WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito de esta lección es hacer que los 
estudiantes examinen el concepto de la igualdad, uno de los conceptos 
fundamentales incorporados a nuestra constitución y leyes, e intento 
para entender porqué trataron a los americanos japoneses tan unfairly
durante WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205249</entry>
          </identifier>

        </educational>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
